Categories: Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Comedy
Product Description: ['Directed by Bruno Baretto staring Sonia Braga BRAZIL (in Portugese with Eng ST)T his Brazilian comedy, based on the novel by leading Brazilian author Jorge Amado, follows the strange events that befall Dona Flor after the death of her wild, irresponsible husband. Attempting to marry more wisely the second time around, she weds a stable but boring pharmacist, only to be visited by the sexy ghost of her late husband']

Don't get me wrong, I like DA very much. Who would not like Maggie Smith's character, or the beautiful daughters or the British accent. But in in the end this is just another melodrama. Only a very fine one. Enjoy while it lasts.
Top Level Telenovela

Wright', 'Jeff Bleckner', 'David Barrett', 'Kate Woods', 'Larry Shaw']}
I am literally hooked on Castle. I watch reruns all the time. It's probably not the best TV series ever made but it's highly entertaining, witty and it also has it's serious moments, when meaningful things are said. Plus it has Stana Katic, whom I think is one of the most beautiful women on TV right now.

Very well acted, witty lines and twisted plots. Stana Katic is absolutely beautiful and has the right chemistry with Nathan Fillion.
I love this show!
{'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Producers': ['Gianna Smart', 'Martin Bruestle'], 'Starring': ['James Gandolfini', 'Edie Falco', 'Lorraine Bracco']}
I was a fan of The Sopranos from the start. For personal reasons that are too complicated to explain I missed the second half of the last season. Now, as a Prime member, I had the opportunity to watch the whole season again. I am still a fan, and as controversial as  it was at the time, I like the finale. Whatever happened to Tony and his family is left to the imagination of the viewer and we can think of any future we want for him without being disappointed. It was also bittersweet to see James Gandolfini delivering a perfect Tony. It is sad to realize the we will never see him again. Rest in peace James and thank you for Tony.
The show the redefined how we see mobsters
